ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 17 Nov 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> i dueled a level 50 ranger twice, once with weapons and once without. he
> won both times pretty handily, though i even did slightly more damage with
> the lute than with the weapons.

Before Pixie Strike was broke, I used to fight til about half
hp, then switch to Hymn/Strike to "pause" the battle while I
healed up. It's very frustrating for your opponent as they
stand there perpetually stunned while you're healing up. I
negated a paladin friend's lay hands this way in the Arena.

> there are two things i would like to try in the future though. he was in
> full thorny vine, with 2 ykeshas and a haste sash.

Now there's a good question. What happens when someone with
haste effects active gets hit by slowdowns?

--
